description:
A BKA detective assigned to the murder case of the hospital, and holds Doctor Tenma Kenzou as a main suspect. He first believes that Dr. Tenma invented Johan; later, he becomes convinced that Johan is, in fact, an alternate personality of Tenma.
After some time, he comes to the conclusion that Tenma is innocent and, ironically, he is the person that testifies at the end to save Tenma from prison.
name: Heinrich Runge
